snippet.title: Announcement Trailer - The Sacrifice
snippet.description:
Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2571720/The_Sacrifice/

Short Description: Immerse yourself in this dark atmospheric puzzle game set in the region of Salem in the 17th century! Help Sarah guide her father with her magical play board and avoid the many dangers of The Sacrifice.
